programme.desc: Lucky and the Doomed Delivery - Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep34
programme.desc: Lucky and the Doubtful Drought - When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep1
programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep1
programme.desc: Somewhere / Over the Rainbow - Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family hes a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep13
programme.desc: Chaser And Chewer / Recipe For Adventure - Tag and Scooch pretend to be their favorite comic book heroes and help the dogs of Pawston. But when Frank and Beans pretend to be villains its up to Chaser and Chewer to stop the trouble makers and save the day. \ Its Bring Your Own Bowl Night at the Barker house, and Tag and Grandmaw team up to make Great Great Auntie Eunice's Famous Far Fetched Cookies. But the obscure ingredients are hard to find, so they have to team up and go on an adventure.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, theyre invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep11
programme.desc: Unholy Dragon Returns to the Mountains - Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep12
programme.desc: Sacrifice at the Edge of Time - The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep9
programme.desc: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 1 - Its Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep13
programme.desc: Free Scauldy - Hiccup, Toothless, and the dragon riders discover an injured Scauldron on the shores of Changewing Island. When the Scauldron takes a shine to Ruffnut, the kids see a chance to heal the dragon and return him safely to the ocean, before he falls victim to the elements, as well as the territorial Changewings.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep14
programme.desc: Frozen - During an ice storm, Speed Stingers infest Berk, driving the residents into hiding.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep15
programme.desc: Tale of Two Dragons - The gang must help the town ready for harvest but Hookfang and Stormfly are at each others throats.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep5
programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Stacis plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.desc: Andrewsarchus & Tooth - Andy travels back in time 36 million years to find a giant carnivorous predator's tooth, but when his backpack is stolen, he enlists the help of a herd of giant brontothere to get it back.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mission: Wake Up! - Diesel is a hearing dog to his owner Ryan who's deaf. Helps Ryan get up in time so he won't be late for his football match. Diesel wakes Ryan up when the alarm goes, and gets Ryan to come downstairs.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Spider Monkey and Tamandua - Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals and reveal the surprising and unusual ways in which they are connected in the wild. This time it's the spider monkey and tamandua. Their wild connection is that they use their prehensile tails to balance and steady themselves.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep15
programme.desc: Pirate Yearbook - Captain Captain is busy looking at last year's Pirate Yearbook, but something is wrong with her picture! So Captain Captain tells the pirates to come up with a better photo for this year's edition!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep45
programme.desc: The Singing Badge - After a long walk the squirrels are starting to get tired, a song will help them get home.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep44
programme.desc: The Comedy Badge - Tag stumbles on some toy blocks and hurts his knee. How can they make him feel better?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep43
programme.desc: The Looking After Badge - Outside the clubhouse a large crowd has gathered around a hot air balloon.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep44
programme.desc: Cave Train Trouble, Slovenia - Glitch has taken Tala on holiday to Slovenia's Postojna Caves, and she is looking forward to finding a rare creature called an olm for her class project. Ubercorn and Lars join them.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep43
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep11
programme.desc: Grudge Match - Raul, the Brazilian tank engine, wants to beat Thomas in a game. But Raul's super-competitive nature soon gets him into trouble.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep26
programme.desc: Scooter Stand Still - Scooter Boy gets his confidence knocked after a small accident, so Sarah & Duck help him to get it back.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Lost Librarian - The Librarian has lost his big reference book and Sarah thinks her toy periscope might help with the search.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pumpkin - Stanley must keep Myrtle's pumpkin safe from Speedy the snail. He builds a series of obstacles and defences to protect it from the tenacious Speedy who tests Stanley's ingenuity.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Carnival - Stanley, Sophie and Benjamin make up a new game, 'Dino-Pirates'. This is such a good game, they use it as inspiration for Stanley's carnival float.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep60
programme.desc: Caring Sharing Monty - Monty is upset when a friend doesn't return his toy, and decides that he won't lend anything again. He soon realises that this isn't always helpful.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep13
programme.desc: It's time to find a dinosaur - After playing with her toy dinosaurs, JoJo decides she would love to see a real one. Gran Gran takes JoJo to the museum to see a fossilised skeleton of a Tyrannosaurus rex!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Family Meeting - When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Faceytalk - Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Ragdoll - Dad agrees to take Bluey and Bingo to the shops to buy an ice-cream if they can get him into the car. Only problem is... he's just entered 'Ragdoll' mode!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the things trees do for creatures around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep7
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Northern Lights, Finland - Ubercorn is excited to see the Northern Lights, but Glitch's Grunge-Grimbler covers them with smoke.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Plum - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Plum performing the Sugar Plum Fairy Bounce and attempting to do not one, not two, but three pirouettes in midair!

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Corn - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Corn singing an A-maiz-ing Counting Song about his remarkably organised kernel rows.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Da Veggie Code - Supertato's Tato belt gets locked inside a glass case for an exhibition, but Tomato can't remember the code to get it out again, and Supertato needs it back to defeat Evil Pea.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Double Trouble - Supertato and Carrot are looking for ice and think Evil Pea has become kind by giving them some. They soon realise it's not Evil Pea after all.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep93
programme.desc: Cold - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po are outside in the cold when they spot the Tiddlytubbies who are warm, inside. The Teletubbies put on hats, gloves and scarves to keep warm.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep25
programme.desc: Y - Dee encourages a friend to say 'y', and they go on an adventure around the sound. They see some yo-yos and a yacht, do some yoga and even meet a yeti!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Mission Poppletoise - On today's poptastic adventure, Hooper find a Poppletoise on the beach. But when the Poppletoise's eggs start to hatch while she's away, can the friends find her in time?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Alien Television - Aliens on OKIDO telly? Skateboarders in the satellite?! Everything's upside down! It's up to Messy and his friends to fix it!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Musical Statues - At the end of a long day, Bluey and her family are out of sync and out of sorts, so Mum gets everyone to play musical statues.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Fairy Tale - Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Table Mountain, South Africa - Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Northern Lights, Finland - Ubercorn is excited to see the Northern Lights, but Glitch's Grunge-Grimbler covers them with smoke.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Fancy Restaurant - Bingo and Bluey want mum and dad to smoochy kiss, so they set up a romantic evening for two at their fancy restaurant. Everything goes to plan, until chef Bingo's special arrives.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Army - Jack is the new dog at school and the newest recruit in Rusty's Army. Jack struggles with following instructions and always forgets his hat, but Rusty will make a soldier of him yet.

programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes #4 (Rpt)
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.desc: The Masters of Rome - Michelangelo, Raphael and Leonardo da Vinci - In late 1513, Michelangelo, Raphael and Leonardo da Vinci were all in Rome at the same time. programme.desc: UFC returns down under to Sydney, Austalia, where Middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against Sean Strickland, the man he took it from, and undefeated TUF 23 winner Tatiana Suarez aims to unseat 2-time champion Zhang Weili for the Women's Strawweight title. Plus more on UFC Reloaded!

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep11
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep28
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1003MorenovsFigueiredo3

programme.title: ROAD TO UFC SEASON 4 Ep1
programme.desc: UFC Performance Institute Shanghai once again this weekend will host back-to-back days of the opening round for ROAD TO UFC Season 4, the hugely successful win and advance tournament that will take top MMA prospects from Asia Pacific and give them a pathway to a UFC contract. In the opening round, 32 mixed martial arts athletes will be competing in each of four weight classes, and four non-tournament bouts will be included to provide more opportunities to showcase up-and-comers.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep704
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Kayla Harrison, Fighter Focus: Jim Miller, Ultimate Access: Chute Boxe, Day 1: Cody Garbrandt - Olympic Judo world champion Kayla Harrison details her transition into MMA, revealing her resilience through childhood abuse, and channeling her pain into athletic triumphs. The UFCs marathon man looks back at this record-breaking career and details his approach to the fight game that has seen him compete at the sports highest level for decades. Exclusive access to a special ceremony held at the original site of the Chute Boxe academy where Charles Oliveira is awarded his black belt by Chute Boxe founder Rudimar Fedrigo. Former Bantamweight champion Cody Garbrandt looks back at the impressive UFC debut performance that launched his decorated career.
